releaseNotes:
[NEW] ⚠️ Account Reset: All user accounts have been reset due to a system update. Please create a new account.
[NEW] 👤 Username for Google Sign-Up: Choose a username when signing up with Google.
[IMPROVED] 📱 Consistent phone number format (0xxxxxxxxxx).
[IMPROVED] ✨ Enhanced confirmation messages and animations.
[IMPROVED] 🚀 Streamlined sign-up flow (profile photo optional later).
[IMPROVED] 📧 Clearer email verification messages.
[IMPROVED] ⚙️ Dashboard layout refinements (Settings removed, Notifications full-width).
[IMPROVED] 🛠️ Settings screen with more options.
[FIXED] ✅ All known build errors and warnings resolved.
[FIXED] ♻️ Resolved deprecation warnings.
[FIXED] 🎨 Minor UI inconsistencies and layout issues addressed.
